Run LDscore regression –h2 flag.

irwl_ldsc.Rd

Run LDscore regression –h2 flag.

Usage

irwl_ldsc(df, ld_size, step1_chi2 = 30, step2_chi2 = NULL, blocks = 200)

Arguments

df

a data.frame containing three columns: c("Z", "N", "L2") Z: Z score of association per snp Z: sample size of variant L2: LD score of variant

ld_size

number of variants used to calculate LD score (Typically MAF > 0.05)

step1_chi2

chi2 threshold for step 1 filter

step2_chi2

chi2 threshold for step 2 filter: max(0.001 * max(ld_df$N), 80)

blocks

number of blocks to use in the jackknife regression. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED

Value

a dplyr::tibble() with two columns: "int" and "obs_h2"

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
irwl_ldsc(df, ld_size = ld_size)
} # }
